content.raw:
From Ignition:

```
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/camera_info
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/depth_image
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/image
```

It appears to be just /<vehicle\_name>/front/image\_raw is what you’re looking for as the ignition side only has one camera on it and there is no extra camera in that vehicle configuration.  Looks like this is just a slight topic migration from the previous Gazebo 9.
content.html:
From Ignition:

/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/camera_info
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/depth_image
/world/tunnel_qual_ign/model/X4/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front/image

It appears to be just /<vehicle_name>/front/image_raw is what you’re looking for as the ignition side only has one camera on it and there is no extra camera in that vehicle configuration. Looks like this is just a slight topic migration from the previous Gazebo 9.
